info.brief_description: At the cross-section of various animated worlds is a hotel where any swap can happen!
info.description:
Inspired by "The Moriarty Arms" by Miranda Lawson and "Swapping Hotel" by Ace. Check them out if you like this:

https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1586877-The-Moriarty-Arms
https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1710608-Swapping-Hotel

This story will follow the same kind of story beats as those stories do, but with a couple of twists. First; the guests are all from animated media. Anime, video games, machinima, Western animation; if it's animated, it counts. Second: the ones doing the swapping are a husband and wife duo who love swapping anything between guests.

I'll allow sex, but no killing off characters. I'll retain the right to add more rules as time goes on. Other than that. have fun!!
